mapper.insert: insert into user (USER_ID, SYS_ACCOUNT, MAILBOX, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, MOBILE, SEX, DUTIES, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, TEL_PHONE, ID_CARD, REMARK, USER_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, PIC_SRC, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFIER, USER_STATE, LCOK_REASON, STAFF_NO) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{duties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lcokReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update user
SYS_ACCOUNT = #{sysAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAILBOX = #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DUTIES = #{duties,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL_PHONE = #{telPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PIC_SRC = #{picSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_STATE = #{userState,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LCOK_REASON = #{lcokReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_NO = #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set SYS_ACCOUNT = #{sysAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAILBOX = #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DUTIES = #{duties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL_PHONE = #{telPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PIC_SRC = #{picSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_STATE = #{userState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, LCOK_REASON = #{lcokReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_NO = #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from user where PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (SYS_ACCOUNT = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR MAILBOX = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
